description:
Yoshino and Kirishima travel to Osaka. She wonders if he is just attached to her or maybe even likes her. But at the same time, Kirishima`s former love interest, Nao, is also staying there.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: I`d Rather You Hate Me Than Not Care, Part One
Je préfère ta haine à ton indifférence (1re partie)
Mukanshin Nara Isso Kirawareta Hou ga Ii: Zenpen
無関心ならいっそ嫌われたほうがいい 前編
